mapper.insert: insert into commodity (id, user_id, commodity_name, commodity_type, price, commodity_address, commodity_description,cover_url) values (#{id}, #{userId}, #{commodityName}, #{commodityType} ,#{price}, #{commodityAddress}, #{commodityDescription}, #{coverUrl});
mapper.update:
update commodity
username=#{username},
sex=#{sex},
phone=#{phone},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,user_id,commodity_name, commodity_type, price, commodity_description, commodity_address, cover_url, commodity_status, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from commodity where id = #{commodityId}
